outcome: Civil Reformers gain support with transparency promises, but struggle against system inertia.

events.description: Civil Reformers host a public forum, inviting citizens to discuss their vision for a more open and transparent government.
Reformers begin documenting system flaws and propose actionable reforms, facing resistance from entrenched technocrats.
Leaked proposals from the Reformers attract significant attention, sparking debates on necessary changes to the BCI.
Despite growing support, Reformers' efforts meet with bureaucratic delays, frustrating citizens eager for change.
